a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of deaths from volcanic eruptions, 1570 to 2017
Deaths from volcanic eruption events includes direct deaths from volcanic eruptions, in addition to secondary
impacts (such as a tsunami or earthquake triggered by an eruption). Due to data availability, reporting and
evidence, it's expected that recent data will be more complete than the long historical record.
Data source: National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC) of the NOAA
